ayas.translation: Indeed We sent it down on the Night of Ordainment.

bismillah.translation: In the Name of Allah, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.

ayas.translation: And what will show you what is the Night of Ordainment?
ayas.transliteration: wa mā adrāka mā laylatul qadr

ayas.arabic: لَيْلَةُ ٱلْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ
ayas.translation: The Night of Ordainment is better than a thousand months.
ayas.transliteration: laylatul qadri khayrun min alfi shahr

ayas.arabic: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمْرٍ
ayas.translation: In it the angels and the Spirit descend, by the leave of their Lord, with every command.
ayas.transliteration: tanazzalul malā-ikatu war rūḥu fīhā bi-idhni rabbihim min kulli amr

ayas.translation: It is peaceful until the rising of the dawn.
